page.title: 07ALLANDALE SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: The group of shops in Allandale Road and Francis Street cater not only for the every day needs of the local residents but also attract people from further afield by providing a number of quality specialist shops.These include jewellers,fine art shops boutiques,a restaurant,hairdressers and a florist.Although it is generally rather expensive to shop here many customers regularly do so because of the friendly personal service.Many of the shop assistants expressed similar views and said that they preferred working in an area where they could get to know their customers. The site has an interesting history in that many years ago it comprised of rows of terraced houses which provided accomodation for servants working in the larger houses nearby.
